dict.string: Balthisar Tidy performs HTML validation, accessibility checking, and pretty printing in its macOS application, System Services, and/or Action Extensions.
Balthisar Tidy checks for software updates, either upon demand or periodically. You can schedule automatic update checks in Balthisar Tidy’s Preferences → Updates.
If you deny this connection, you will not be notified of new versions of Balthisar Tidy.
Balthisar Tidy performs HTML document validation with this web service.
If you deny this connection, you will not be able to perform HTML document validation with the W3C service.
Balthisar Tidy performs HTML document validation with the web service of your choice. You can choose this server in Balthisar Tidy’s Preferences → Validator.
If you deny this connection, you will not be able to perform HTML document validation with the service you have selected.
